Transcription for 546199

See a griddle, see a griddle, You can't get by your rules.
The lady down the pond, Who's the bird in the box, Who's this the boy in the box?
Rules, rules, rules.
Rules and rules, rules and rules, In the way I am in.
But don't go beside your guard, When my boy can sing.
Rules, rules, rules and rules, In the way I am in.
Rules, rules, rules and rules, In the way I am in.
Rules, rules, rules.
